mainLayout.Remediation to changes in the statuses c: Remediation to changes in the statuses configuration
mainLayout.validation of statuses remediation:
It seems that you have changed the configuration od the test cases statuses.
But some of these new statuses do not match existing test cases statuses.
Please review the existing statuses to switch them to the configured ones.
mainLayout.Some deprecated statuses have no target: Some deprecated statuses have no target status, please choose a target status for each one
mainLayout.Something went wrong with the last opera: Something went wrong with the last operation, please retry

homePage.Required field, please enter a login: Required field, please enter a login

homePage.Invalid login or password, please retry: Invalid login or password, please retry
homePage.Name: Name
homePage.Valid GIT modifications on test suite, a: Valid GIT modifications on test suite, as repository has been updated
homePage.Choose a new branch for test suite, as c: Choose a new branch for test suite, as current branch has been deleted
homePage.first step creation of test suite help t:
First step: where can we find the test files ? In a GIT repository I suppose ?
You can grab a local file repository giving its absolute file path, or a remote one using git or http protocol, as you like !
homePage.Key passphrase (leave blank if key has n: Key passphrase (leave blank if key has no passphrase)
homePage.Repository creation failed, please check: Repository creation failed, please check its address and credentials
homePage.Ok we have cloned the repository, and we: Ok we have cloned the repository, and we found
homePage.multiple branches: on which would you ex: multiple branches: on which would you extract the tests ?
homePage.only one branch, is it correct ?: only one branch, is it correct ?
homePage.third step creation of test suite help t:
We do not want to warn you every time the repository get a new commit, so you can here select the files that are test files,
 in order to have warnings only when YOUR test files change. And yes, we assume it is only markdown files !

testSuitePage.diff validation step of test suite modif: Now you see all the resulting changes. You can change the status of the modified tests if the differences are too important.
testSuitePage.File has been moved to new File and modi: {file} has been moved to {newFile} and modified
testSuitePage.There is no differences between current: There is no differences between current local and target repository state.
